response.overview: Join T.V. Teddy as he talks, laughs and sings along with this exciting new interactive video, T.V. Teddy and his on-screen pal Anthony enhance this exciting Berenstain Bears cartoon by encouraging children to participate, learn and have fun! In this episode of The Berenstain Bears No-So-Buried Treasure, Papa Bear and the cubs search with great anticipation for the secret buried treasure of Pirates Cove. Buried treasure takes on a whole new meaning when Mama Bear and Grizzly Gran decide to teach everyone a valuable lesson.
response.title: The Berenstain Bears: Not-So-Buried Treasure
